targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pdu_http")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voltage")
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pdu_http")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current")
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pdu_http")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature")
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
